Sr. Business Development Manager – Southwest Region at Strategic Systems Inc
December 20, 2016, Chad managed George directly

It's my pleasure to write a recommendation for George.  George worked me May 2014 to March of 2015 at Yoh.  George recruited on a variety of very technical IT and Engineering positions.  I've been in the business over 20 years and have come to realize that some people just "get it".  George was one of those people.  He learned quickly, wasn't afraid to jump on new things, and was open to feedback on how he could do better.  I would hire him again in a heartbeat.

If you want to meet a positive Recruiter who can engage candidates and hiring managers you should meet George Lucas.

Mark Henderson
Field Operations Leader at Apple Inc
January 19, 2015, Mark was senior to George but didn’t manage directly

It is rare to come across a leader that always makes time for employees, that cares enough to ask how you're doing, and can inspire people to do their best work everyday, but that is just who Mark is. I spent several years at Apple and from the start I knew that people like Mark make Apple a special place to be. He is a genuine and kind person that always made me feel valued. I would be very lucky to work with someone like Mark again.

summary: I'm currently seeking outgoing college grads for Ryder's Management Trainee program. Visit jobs.ryder.com and find an opportunity in your area. Please reach out to me if you're interested in learning more. george_m_lucas@ryder.com---------------------------------Proactive Recruiter with experience in multiple types of talent acquisition, including high volume, campus, and technical recruiting. Obtained a bachelor’s degree in Communication from Arizona State University. Experienced with onboarding, training, and public speaking. Accustomed to working with diverse groups of people from a variety of industries.Skills:- Full Cycle Recruitment- High Volume, Technical, and Campus Recruiting- Applicant Tracking Systems, Taleo Business Edition, iCIMS- Conducting Interviews via Phone, Video, and In Person- Online Sourcing (LinkedIn, Dice, CareerBuilder, Indeed)- Managing and Attending Career Fair Events- Offer Letters, Background Checks and Drug Screens- Onboarding (Including Orientations and I-9 Verification)- Comfortable Interacting with C level Executives- Leadership within Recruiting OrganizationFun Facts:- I play guitar in a Beatles cover band- I built my family's kitchen table from scratch- I'm an intermediate skier (I still wipe out now and then)- I have the same name as a certain director (no relation)- I have a passion for travel
name: George Lucas
title: Recruiter + Dad + Musician
